Source.Name: polylith
Source.Summary: Clojure tool for managing polylith projects
Source.Description: The poly tool helps you manage your polylith projects which introduces the architectural concept of “service level building blocks” which can be combined like LEGO® bricks to build our services and systems.

Package.Name: polylith
Package.Summary: Clojure tool for managing polylith projects
Package.Description: The poly tool helps you manage your polylith projects which introduces the architectural concept of “service level building blocks” which can be combined like LEGO® bricks to build our services and systems.
